headline: Verizon declares quarterly dividend on June 6
summary: NEW YORK, N.Y. -- The Board of Directors at Verizon Communications Inc. today declared a quarterly dividend of 67.75 cents per outstanding share, unchanged from the previous quarter. The quarterly...
